entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 26 December 2022
